ygData.subject: Domain unresolvable Error for a regular URL in the seed report
ygData.msgSnippet: I am using Heritrix 1.14.4 starting with 5000 seeds. Most options are just default. But I got quite a few error messages in the seed report, saying that

I am using Heritrix 1.14.4 starting with 5000 seeds. 
Most options are just=
 default. But I got quite a few error messages in the seed report, saying t=
hat "domain unresolvable". Examples are below:

http://facproductions.net/p=
reprints/
http://cs.stir.ac.uk/%7Eman/ 
http://jameshamilton.eu/sites/defau=
lt/files/MPhilTransferReport.pdf 

these are regular URLs and you can easil=
y access the page content from a regular web browser. But why Heritrix repo=
rts this error? Is there any configuration that I did wrong?
